name: Sea Fury
immunities: cold, fire, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The sea fury can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The sea fury’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: witch bolt * 1/day each: bestow curse, fear, thunderwave

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the sea fury fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sea fury has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sea fury makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Death Glare
actions.desc: The sea fury targets one frightened creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.
